trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to replace COM-based data binding in an application upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
Initializes an instance of a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
Adds a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref> to a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that contains data.
A `String` that contains a property name.
A `String` that contains the name of a data field.
Optional.
An <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp"></xref> interface.
Optional.
A `String` that contains the key value.
A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref> interface.
Adds a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref> to a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that contains data.
A `String` that contains a property name.
A `String` that contains the name of a data field.
An <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IDataFormatDisp"></xref> interface.
A `String` that contains the key value.
`true` to bind immediately; otherwise `false`.
A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref> interface.
Clears the collection of binding objects.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
Gets the total number of bindings in the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An `Integer` that contains the count.
Gets or sets the data member for a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
A `String` that contains the name of the data member.
Gets or sets the data source for a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
A COM-based `msdatasrc.DataSource` object.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.
This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`.
When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
`true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets an enumerator for a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> for the collection.
Gets the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref> at the specified index.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the index.
A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref> interface.
Removes a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBinding"></xref> interface from a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the index.
Determines whether to save changes in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
Gets the current row from the data source of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref> object and resets the contents of controls bound through the object.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
Gets or sets the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection.UpdateMode"></xref> for a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MBindingCollection"></xref>.

Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
A <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBindingCollection.UpdateMode"></xref> enumeration.
